text: (Who doeth greater wrong) who is more insolent towards, and bolder against, Allah (than he who inventeth a lie concerning Allah) thus ascribing to Him a son and partners, (or denieth the Truth) or denies Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an (when it cometh unto him) when Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an come to him? (Is not there a home in hell for disbelievers) Abu Jahl and his host?
